job.description: ltstronggtltugtMust HaveltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtMS shop experience azure etcltligtltligtLead experience  mentoring devs doesnt need to be in a true dev lead role currently but used to mentoring and being a leaderltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtDay To DayltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtLead kickoff and overview meetings with teams and assigns features to development teamsltligtltligtIdentify detailed features with acceptance criteria develop estimates per feature identify discrepancies identify and document risks and assumptions and complete a prototype if neededltligtltligtWhen working with feature teams focus on improving the quality of interactions between the teamsltligtltligtBe responsible for troubleshooting issues in nonproduction environments and with other teams to resolve any issuesltligtltligtPlay release manager and engineer roles during releasesltligtltulgt HybridRED OnsiteRED
